name: Sandra's Chicken with Peanut Curry Sauce
ingredients: 8 ounces frozen cut green beans, thawed
8 ounces frozen bell pepper strips, thawed
2 tablespoon granular Splenda or equivalent liquid Splenda

instructions.en: In a 4-cup measuring cup, whisk together all of the sauce ingredients except the cilantro; set aside.
instructions.sk: V 4-šálkovej odmerke zmiešajte všetky ingrediencie na omáčku okrem koriandra; odložte bokom.
instructions.ja: 4カップの計量カップに、コリアンダー以外のソースの材料をすべて入れて泡立て器で混ぜ、脇に置きます。

instructions.en: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Sauté the chicken just until the outside is opaque.
instructions.sk: Rozohrejte olej vo veľkej panvici na stredne vysokom ohni. Opečte kura, kým nie je zvonku nepriehľadné.
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンで中高温で油を熱し、鶏肉の外側が不透明になるまで炒めます。

instructions.en: Add the green beans and peppers; cook another 3 minutes, stirring frequently.
instructions.sk: Pridajte zelené fazuľky a papriky; varte ďalšie 3 minúty za častého miešania.
instructions.ja: インゲンとパプリカを加え、頻繁に混ぜながらさらに3分間調理します。

instructions.en: Add the sauce to the skillet with the chicken and vegetables. Bring to a boil then turn down the heat and simmer 6-8 minutes until the sauce thickens slightly.
instructions.sk: Pridajte omáčku do panvice s kuracím mäsom a zeleninou. Priveďte do varu, potom znížte teplotu a varte 6-8 minút, kým omáčka mierne nezhustne.
instructions.ja: フライパンの鶏肉と野菜にソースを加えます。沸騰させてから火を弱め、ソースが少し濃くなるまで6〜8分間煮込みます。
提供する際にコリアンダーをふりかけます。

notes: Makes 4-6 servings. Freezing not recommended. For 6 servings, use 2 pounds of chicken. Crunchy or creamy peanut butter can be used.
